mapper.select: select count(*) from taste where uno = #{uno}

SELECT t.cno AS categoryId, COUNT(*) AS preferenceCount FROM user u JOIN taste t ON u.uno = t.uno WHERE u.age BETWEEN CASE WHEN #{age} % 10 = 0 THEN #{age} - 9 ELSE (#{age} - (#{age} % 10)) END AND CASE WHEN #{age} % 10 = 0 THEN #{age} ELSE (#{age} - (#{age} % 10) + 9) END AND u.gender = #{gender} GROUP BY t.cno
